/opt/cuda/bin/g++   -std=c++11  -lcblas CMakeFiles/global_op.dir/main.cpp.o  -o global_op  /opt/cuda/lib64/libcudart_static.a -ldl /usr/lib/librt.so /opt/cuda/lib64/libcudart_static.a -ldl /usr/lib/librt.so /usr/lib/libopencv_dnn.so.4.1.2 /usr/lib/libopencv_gapi.so.4.1.2 /usr/lib/libopencv_highgui.so.4.1.2 /usr/lib/libopencv_ml.so.4.1.2 /usr/lib/libopencv_objdetect.so.4.1.2 /usr/lib/libopencv_photo.so.4.1.2 /usr/lib/libopencv_stitching.so.4.1.2 /usr/lib/libopencv_video.so.4.1.2 /usr/lib/libopencv_videoio.so.4.1.2 -lpthread /usr/lib/libopencv_imgcodecs.so.4.1.2 /usr/lib/libopencv_calib3d.so.4.1.2 /usr/lib/libopencv_features2d.so.4.1.2 /usr/lib/libopencv_flann.so.4.1.2 /usr/lib/libopencv_imgproc.so.4.1.2 /usr/lib/libopencv_core.so.4.1.2
